comment.author: Layla
comment.text: Where are all my fellow AMERICAN PATRIOTS!!!!! It's time to FALL IN, TAKE UP ARMS, and TAKE BACK WHAT WE WHOLE HEARTLY WANT!!!!!!!! We want our country back. Stand and defend, your country!!!!!
